comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Thomas Gore was a blind man who served in the Senate for many years, representing Oklahoma: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Gore

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
He was a grandfather of the novelist Gore Vidal. Quoting Wikipedia:
"His grandson, author Gore Vidal, has stated that his grandfather was an atheist and had a strong misanthropic streak: 'He was a genuine populist; but he did not like people very much. He always said no to anyone who wanted government aid.' During a speech to the National Press Club on November 4, 1994, Vidal claimed that Thomas Gore had said 'If there was any race other than the human race, I'd go join it.''"
